title: information security practitioners
extract: A “practitioner” is someone who actively engaged in a particular discipline or profession. Therefore, an information security practitioner is someone who is actively involved in information security. For example, they could be: A Network Security Engineer. An IT Security Manager.
extract_html: A “practitioner” is someone who actively engaged in a particular discipline or profession. Therefore, an information security practitioner is someone who is actively involved in information security. For example, they could be: A Network Security Engineer. An IT Security Manager.
